item.title: Quick and Delicious Vegan Recipes for Beginners
item.description: Discover the joy of cooking with these quick and delicious vegan recipes! Featuring fresh vegetables, hearty grains, and vibrant spices, these meals are perfect for busy weeknights. Ideal for anyone looking to explore plant-based cooking. Pin this collection for easy meal inspiration!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 20 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups of chopped fresh vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini, carrots)
  • 1 cup of cooked quinoa or rice
  • 1 can of black beans, rinsed and drained
  • 2 tablespoons of olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon of cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh herbs for garnish (cilantro or parsley)

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Begin by heating olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chopped vegetables and sautÃ© for about 5 minutes until they start to soften.
  2. Stir in the cooked quinoa or rice, followed by the black beans. Mix well to combine all ingredients.
  3. Season the mixture with cumin, salt, and pepper. Cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until everything is heated through.
  4. Once cooked, remove from heat and let it sit for a minute. Serve warm, garnished with fresh herbs.
  5. Enjoy your delicious vegan meal, perfect for any occasion!
